M = mod = 998244353
def factors(n):return sorted(set(reduce(list.__add__, ([i, n//i] for i in range(1, int(n**0.5) + 1) if n % i == 0))))
def inv_mod(n):return pow(n, mod - 2, mod)

def main():

    f = []

    f += [c + d] * 100
    f.sort()
